text: If a party establishes that an appeal from a foreign-country judgment is pending or will be taken, the court may stay any proceedings with regard to the foreign-country judgment until the:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 19-86, see notes under ยง 15-361.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 8 of the Uniform Foreign-Country Money Judgments Recognition Act. See Vol. 13, Part II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 15-368

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Appellant has had sufficient time to prosecute the appeal and has failed to do so.

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Stay of proceedings pending appeal of foreign-country judgment.
